definition: foot/leg (of an animal or an object)/base (of an object)/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]/classifier for kicks
web (of feet of ducks, frogs etc)

sentences.english: The next day I bought a pair of swim fins and I have been skin diving ever since.
sentences.chinese: 我第二天买了一橡皮脚蹼，自此从事切肤潜水。

sentences.english: Will Suarez be playing in flippers and snorkel.
sentences.chinese: 苏亚雷斯会不会戴着脚蹼和通气管上场踢球？

sentences.english: I immediately put on my durable swim fins and dived into the ocean.
sentences.chinese: 我迅速穿上耐用的潜水脚蹼，潜入海中。

sentences.english: Is juggling a ball while wearing a red nose and seal flippers “sport”?
sentences.chinese: 难道戴着红鼻子穿着脚蹼杂耍似的玩球就是“体育”？

sentences.english: Then the dolphins perform a private show, showing off there amazing jumps and waving their flippers.
sentences.chinese: 接着海豚进行了惊人的跳跃，挥舞脚蹼等表演。

sentences.english: so why don't we just allow everyone to have flippers when they're swimming?
sentences.chinese: 所以为什么我们不允许，所有人在游泳时戴上脚蹼呢？

definition: web (of feet of ducks, frogs etc)
